txt.en: Thâng and Mâlatuk's raiders can be found in Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should defeat Thâng and Mâlatuk's raiders while avoiding the guards.
'Good riddance to those raiders. They died with no honour!'
A guard spotted you sneaking around!

'Thâng and Mâlatuk send raiders to try to thwart me! You must take care of this! With Fushaum Tum in my sights, I do not have time for these petty raiders.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is only available while the quest, The Fushaum Resolution, is underway.</rgb>
Khirgi can be found at Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should talk to Khirgi.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
<rgb=#FF0000>Don't let the Fushaum Guards spot you</rgb>
Fushaum Bal North: Fushaum Bal Raiders
